metadata.title: A COMPENDIUM OF REVIEWS IN BIOCHEMISTRY AND MOLECULAR BIOLOGY PUBLISHED IN THE SECOND HALF OF 1991

abstract.text: l. A compendium of reviews and mini-reviews in Biochemistry and Molecular Biology published in the second half of 1991 is presented. In all 880 titles are listed from 108 different publications. 2. This ccmpendium presents the references by Joumal Name-the most suitable format for a hardcopy of this infomtation. Keywords have been included with each reference to increase the value of the collection. Keyword and author cross-reference indexes are not included but are available in the electronic database from which this version was constmcted. Should anyone wish to have this information in electronic form it can be distributed on MS-DOS fomtatted flopppy disks in either Reference Manager or Medline format. The author should be contacted for details of the number of pre-formatted floppy disks required.
